sections.title: Instructions
sections.markdown:
- Set aside about 20 minutes in a quiet spot.
- Use short phrases; complete sentences are optional.
- If a prompt does not fit, skip it and move on.
- Read through once, then summarize in your own words.

sections.title: Client worksheet
sections.markdown:
### What this is
Sleep and mood influence each other. Poor sleep can lower patience and increase sensitivity to stress.

### Why it matters
- Better sleep supports emotion regulation.
- Small changes compound quickly.

### Try this
- Pick one sleep habit to improve this week.
- Track how mood shifts.

### Common traps
- Trying to fix everything in one night.
- Staying in bed while wide awake.
